title: Basic timer with personalizable music from Youtube
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to create a timer with youtube music.

Select **SpeechRecognition** to transform your smartphone in a speech recognition device

![speech recognition device](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the lamp locally.

Select **AudioPlayer** to transform your device in a audio player

![audio player](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/AudioPlayer-Item.png)
Click on _Open in this device_ to open the audio player locally
Move the ![pause](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/pause-component.png) component into the workspace, this component represents the time to be measured with the timer

Move the **play audio of** component into the workspace

![PlayAudioOf](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/timer/PlayAudioOf.png), this component allows us to play the audio from a youtube video
